title: The snowballing icon thing was a really good idea!
body:
It just encourages the christmas spirit, 

I've just had great long conversations with people on my friends list who i haven't even talked to till now (added from one game ages ago that no-one can remember) because one of us gifted the other a snowball icon, and it almost turns into a proper snowball fight with trying to outdo eachother,

well done riot, well done!

replies.body: Just made somebody's night by gifting them :) Amazing what the spirit of Christmas can do
